scripts.dev:migrate:up: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec next yarn ts-node ./server/utils/migrator up
scripts.dev:migrate:create: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec next yarn ts-node ./server/utils/migrator create --folder ./server/migrations --name new-migration.ts
scripts.dev:migrate:down: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec next yarn ts-node ./server/utils/migrator down
scripts.dev:migrate:pending: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec next yarn ts-node ./server/utils/migrator pending
scripts.dev:migrate:executed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec next yarn ts-node ./server/utils/migrator executed
scripts.dev:create-test-data: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec next yarn ts-node ./server/utils/createTestData
